mapper.select: select ANALS_TRGET_MT, avg(LON_RATE) as LON_RATE from loan_analysis where ANALS_TRGET_YEAR = #{ANALS_TRGET_YEAR} group by ANALS_TRGET_MT
select WKDAY_NM, avg(LON_RATE) as LON_RATE from loan_analysis where ANALS_TRGET_YEAR = #{ANALS_TRGET_YEAR} and ANALS_TRGET_MT = #{ANALS_TRGET_MT} group by WKDAY_NM

select AREA_NM, case when AREA_NM='서울특별시' then '서울' when AREA_NM='부산광역시' then '부산' when AREA_NM='대구광역시' then '대구' when AREA_NM='인천광역시' then '인천' when AREA_NM='광주광역시' then '광주' when AREA_NM='대전광역시' then '대전' when AREA_NM='울산광역시' then '울산' when AREA_NM='세종특별자치시' then '세종' when AREA_NM='경기도' then '경기' when AREA_NM='강원도' then '강원' when AREA_NM='충청북도' then '충북' when AREA_NM='충청남도' then '충남' when AREA_NM='전라북도' then '전북' when AREA_NM='전라남도' then '전남' when AREA_NM='경상북도' then '경북' when AREA_NM='경상남도' then '경남' when AREA_NM='제주특별자치도' then '제주' end as area , avg(LON_RATE) as LON_RATE from loan_analysis where ANALS_TRGET_YEAR = #{ANALS_TRGET_YEAR} and ANALS_TRGET_MT = #{ANALS_TRGET_MT} group by AREA_NM
select a.title, a.author, a.publisher, a.pub_date, b.loan_cnt, a.vol from book_detail as a inner join book_rank as b on a.isbn13 = b.isbn13 order by loan_cnt desc
